title: Apigee - The Big Picture
abstract:
# Apigee - The Big Picture
You are currently viewing version 1.1 of the Apigee hybrid documentation. **This version is end of life.** You should upgrade to a newer version. For more information, see [Supported versions](/apigee/docs/hybrid/supported-platforms#supported-versions) .
Using Apigee hybrid is a three-part process (well, 2 parts and an ):
| 0                                                                      | 1                                                         | 2                                                 |
|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Part 1: CONFIGURE GCP & UI Get your project and organization set up with GCP & hybrid UI Prerequisites: Permission from Apigee Sales Install gcloud CLI When you're done: New GCP account & project Created an organization Enabled APIs Created an environment 1: CONFIGURE IT | Part 2: INSTALL THE RUNTIME Install the runtime in your cluster with this quickstart Prerequisites: Complete Part 1 When you're done: Installed runtime Customized runtime Exposed MART At least 1 new environment 2: Install It | Post-install: TEST Check that everything is working as expected Prerequisites: Complete Part 1 & Part 2 When you're done: Created and deployed a new proxy Checked deployment status 3: Test It |
| Part 1: CONFIGURE GCP & UI                                                              | nan                                                         | nan                                                |
| Get your project and organization set up with GCP & hybrid UI Prerequisites: Permission from Apigee Sales Install gcloud CLI When you're done: New GCP account & project Created an organization Enabled APIs Created an environment             | nan                                                         | nan                                                |
| 1: CONFIGURE IT                                                                  | nan                                                         | nan                                                |
| Part 2: INSTALL THE RUNTIME                                                               | nan                                                         | nan                                                |
| Install the runtime in your cluster with this quickstart Prerequisites: Complete Part 1 When you're done: Installed runtime Customized runtime Exposed MART At least 1 new environment                        | nan                                                         | nan                                                |
| 2: Install It                                                                   | nan                                                         | nan                                                |
| Post-install: TEST                                                                 | nan                                                         | nan                                                |
| Check that everything is working as expected Prerequisites: Complete Part 1 & Part 2 When you're done: Created and deployed a new proxy Checked deployment status                             | nan                                                         | nan                                                |
| 3: Test It                                                                   | nan                                                         | nan
